Introduction
Ruby-VPI is a &ruby..ulink; interface to Verilog VPI. It lets you create complex Verilog test benches easily and wholly in Ruby.

Alternatives
The following projects are similar or related to Ruby-VPI. In that respect, they may be considered as alternatives.
RHDL
Ruby abstraction of VHDL and Verilog.
MyHDL
Python abstraction of Verilog.
JOVE
Java interface to VPI.
ScriptEDA
Perl, Python, and Tcl interface to VPI.
Ye olde PLI
The following projects utilize the archaic tf and acc PLI interfaces, which have been officially deprecated in IEEE Std. 1364-2005.
ScriptSim
Perl, Python, and Tcl/Tk interface to PLI.
Verilog::Pli
Perl interface to PLI.
JPLI
Java interface to PLI
